nodes.text: Chalacta was a Mid Rim planet, homeworld of the Chalactan Adepts.

Chalacta was a pleasant world located in the Kastolar sector of the Mid Rim. It was the homeworld of the Chalactans, a well-known, baseline Human culture, though were so distinct, that they were considered Near-Humans. Chalactan lived in small farms and cities and were very peaceful and spiritual. They were universally respected and known for the Chalactan Adepts.
Chalacta was once an uninhabited planet until it was colonized by the Chalactan Adepts.

Circa 22 BBY, the Chalactans were represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator Yudrish Sedran, who opposed the Military Creation Act after consulting the wisdom of the Temple of Illumination. Chalacta was the homeworld of Jedi Depa Billaba and Sar Labooda.
During the Clone Wars, the planet was located within Separatist space.
The Yuuzhan Vong seized control of the world shortly after arriving in Hutt Space.
